channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Transgender sailors, Marines offered benefits to voluntarily leave service or face being kicked out
item.description: The policy aligns with an executive order President Donald Trump signed in January to bar transgender individuals from serving in the military.

item.title: Scuttled CDC Pick Slams Big Pharma And Senators On Its Payroll
item.description: Dr. Dave Weldon said concerns that Big Pharma was behind the fight against his nomination for CDC director were 'probably true.'

item.title: The Crimean War’s Lessons for War and Peace in Ukraine
item.description: History repeats itself in Ukraine, but we shouldn’t reenact it blindly.

item.title: Trump Slams ‘Communist’ Persecution Of Conservatives While Speaking At DOJ
item.description: 'Our predecessors turned this Department of Justice into the Department of Injustice. ... Those days are over.'

item.title: Art Deco Knockouts, Velázquez, Hals, and More at the World’s Grandest Art Fair
item.description: In Maastricht in the Netherlands, the exhibition hall bursts with art treasures and connoisseurs, checkbooks in hand.

item.title: Covid Tyrants Were Perpetrators, Not Victims
item.description: The Covid 'experts' chose the unscientific tyranny of lockdowns, mandates, and petty, ineffective, legalistic rules, and they didn’t have to.

item.title: President Trump signs continuing resolution, officially averting a shutdown
item.description: A government shutdown has officially been averted, as President Donald Trump signs the continuing resolution into law.

item.description: President Donald Trump blasted former President Joe Biden’s Department of Justice, accusing the agency of becoming the “department of injustice."

item.title: Trump’s Executive Order Targeting Perkins Coie Must Be Condemned
item.description: The president’s EO is nothing less than a bill of attainder, and a deep constitutional wrong.

item.title: Tennessee bill allows schools to deny enrollment for illegal migrants, proposal panned as unconstitutional
item.description: Tennessee state lawmakers introduced a bill to allow school districts and law enforcement agencies to deny enrollment to illegal migrant students.

item.title: Detrans Awareness Day Heralds A Reckoning For Transgender ‘Medicine’ Fraudsters
item.description: Detransitioners' lawsuits against the medical systems that hurt them could finally undo the industry’s embrace of transgenderism.

item.title: Trump signs government funding extension, warding off another shutdown
item.description: President Trump signed Republicans' yearlong government funding extension, avoiding a partial government shutdown, the White House said Saturday.
